content:
On Firefox I got warning on the website https://brlcad.org/gallery/

Websites prove their identity via certificates, which are valid for a set time period. The certificate for brlcad.org expired on 7/24/2023.
Error code: SEC_ERROR_EXPIRED_CERTIFICATE

Anyone got similar warning?

Yeah, need to do something about that ... the certificate is updated automatically every few days actually. But if apache has no issues and doesn't restart, the new certificate doesn't get loaded. We apparently went a year without any reason to restart apache.
